response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the pork chop on the plate, which is the final subtask. Therefore, no further actions are required.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Grasp the pork chop from the fridge.
(3) Move the robot to the countertop where the plate is.
(4) Put the pork chop on the plate.
response.code: # No further code is required as the task has been completed.
